img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Turtle_13.jpg)
Another move she can now perform in her enhanced state is to expel a bunch of those serpent-like electric projectiles straight up from her body, which will twist in the air before coming back down to track you, and will require you taking some evasive action.
img_below_text:
Finally (and possibly most terrifyingly), she can hover high into the air and create a giant group of her electrified spears all around her, sending volleys of them outward in several directions to track you down. Try not to panic, and use Cloud Step to give her the slip, or keep strafing and dodging as much as you can.
![Wukong Turtle 15.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/39/Wukong_Turtle_15.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Turtle 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Turtle_13.jpg)
Another move she can now perform in her enhanced state is to expel a bunch of those serpent-like electric projectiles straight up from her body, which will twist in the air before coming back down to track you, and will require you taking some evasive action."
        - Following Text: "Finally (and possibly most terrifyingly), she can hover high into the air and create a giant group of her electrified spears all around her, sending volleys of them outward in several directions to track you down. Try not to panic, and use Cloud Step to give her the slip, or keep strafing and dodging as much as you can.
![Wukong Turtle 15.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/39/Wukong_Turtle_15.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a dramatic encounter with a boss character named Kang Jin Star. The boss is performing a powerful attack, emitting electrified projectiles in multiple directions. The setting is a snowy, mountainous landscape, and the player character is visible in the foreground, suggesting a need for evasive maneuvers to avoid the incoming attack. The context indicates this is part of a challenging boss fight, requiring strategic movement and timing to survive.
